initial_question.title: Call repomix from within a node script
initial_question.body: Hi, I would like to use repomix in my application. Is it possible to call repomix as a node library, as opposed to a command line tool? If so, is there documentation on that somewhere? Thank you!

satisfaction_conditions: Repomix functionality is accessible programmatically within Node.js
Basic operations can be performed through function calls
Library can be imported using standard module import mechanisms
Configuration options can be passed programmatically
